scripts.postinstall: cd standalone && typings install && typings prune && cd ../wdio && typings install && typings prune
scripts.build-standalone: cd standalone && tsc -p . && typings bundle -o out --global
scripts.build-wdio: cd wdio && tsc -p . && typings bundle -o out --global
scripts.build: npm run build-standalone && npm run build-wdio
scripts.test: npm run test-standalone && npm run test-wdio
scripts.build+test-standalone: npm run build-standalone && npm run test-standalone
scripts.build+test-wdio: npm run build-wdio && npm run test-wdio
scripts.build+test: npm run build+test-standalone && npm run build+test-wdio
scripts.typedoc-standalone: typedoc --module es6 --target es6 --includeDeclarations --excludeExternals --readme standalone/docs_index.md --name "TypeScript definitions for WebDriverIO Stanalone mode" --mode file --out typedoc/standalone stanalone/index.d.ts stanalone/typings/index.d.ts
scripts.typedoc-wdio: typedoc --module es6 --target es6 --includeDeclarations --excludeExternals --readme wdio/docs_index.md --name "TypeScript definitions for WebDriverIO WDIO mode" --mode file --out typedoc/wdio wdio/index.d.ts wdio/typings/index.d.ts
scripts.typedoc: npm run typedoc-standalone && npm run typedoc-wdio
scripts.all: npm run typedoc && npm run lint && npm run build+test
